name: paradiseresortswebsites
description: Sitios web simulando el entorno de Google Play y el sitio web de la aplicaci√≥n.

scripts.setup: npm install && concurrently "cd GooglePlaySite/google-play-site && npm install" "cd ApplicationSite/paradise-resorts-website && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently -n PLAY,APP -c blue,green "cd GooglePlaySite/google-play-site && ng serve --port 4201" "cd ApplicationSite/paradise-resorts-website && ng serve --port 4202"
